summary: A local doctor is recruited as a cold war spy to fulfill a very important secret mission in the Middle East, only to experience that his mission is complicated by a sexy female double agent.
cast: David Niven|Françoise Dorléac|John Le Mesurier|Cyril Cusack|Eric Pohlmann|Richard Marner|Paul Stassino|George Pravda|Noel Harrison|Ronald Radd|Alan Gifford|Bill Nagy|George Mikell|Nigel Davenport|Reginald Beckwith|Gábor Baraker|Geoffrey Bayldon|Derek Partridge|Robert Raglan|Riyad Gholmieh|Muhsen Samrani|Basil Dignam|Gordon Tanner|Peter Avella|Pauline Chamberlain|Durra|Robert Rietty|Guy Standeven
title: ¿Dónde están los espías?
